image.alt: Harwell & Cook Orthodontics doctors smiling in the office

paragraphs.text: Harwell & Cook Orthodontics is a family‑oriented orthodontic practice serving the Texas and Oklahoma Panhandles. Our trusted doctors and team use cutting‑edge technology to create comfortable, efficient, and personalized treatment plans for kids, teens, and adults — all delivered in a welcoming, family‑first environment.
Smiles come first at Harwell & Cook; we offer complimentary consultations and tailor each plan to the patient’s needs.

items.title: 3D Accuracy
items.text: Instant 3D scans and a 3D smile simulator let us plan precisely and show you predicted results.

items.title: No‑Goop Scans
items.text: Modern intraoral scanning provides a comfortable, no‑goop impression experience for patients of all ages.

items.title: Patient Experience
items.text: A family‑focused team delivering friendly, personal care from convenient local offices across the Panhandles.

items.title: Free Consults
items.text: Complimentary new‑patient consultations and fully customized treatment plans crafted by our doctors.

paragraphs.text: Dr. Anthony Harwell, DDS, MS leads the practice with a multi‑generational commitment to patient care. Education includes a BA in Mathematics from Vanderbilt University, a Doctor of Dental Surgery from Baylor College of Dentistry, and a Certificate in Orthodontics with a Master of Science earned during specialty training.

Dr. Tony Harwell established practice roots in the Panhandles and built the multi‑office legacy that Harwell & Cook Orthodontics continues today. His career included expanded offices across the region and a long history of community care and mentorship.

Dr. Tanner Cook joined the practice bringing additional expertise and a patient‑first approach. He earned a BS in Chemistry and Biochemistry and completed dental and orthodontic training, including a DDS and a Certificate in Orthodontics with a Master of Science.

Our team blends decades of experience with a friendly, family‑first approach. From clinical assistants to front‑desk coordinators, everyone contributes to a positive, efficient patient experience across our local offices.
From discreet aligners to targeted orthodontic appliances, we offer treatments designed for comfort and predictable results.

testimonials.author: Brooke
testimonials.testimonial: “My name is Brooke. I am 13 years old and I have braces with Harwell and Cook Orthodontics. Everyone is super nice and friendly, and the appointments go by really quick. I highly recommend Harwell and Cook Orthodontics because it’s such a great environment!”

testimonials.author: Hudson
testimonials.testimonial: “I came to Harwell & Cook for braces. At first I was nervous, but everyone here just put me at ease… Dr. Anthony is a stand‑up guy. Overall, I had a fantastic experience. I’m very happy with the result.”

testimonials.author: Vicky (Vicki)
testimonials.testimonial: “All four of my kids have been and still are patients of Dr. Harwell and Cook. It’s been a wonderful experience. We love the location. It’s so convenient and personable. It’s very welcoming.” — Vicki, Amarillo

seo.page_keywords: orthodontics, Invisalign, braces, palatal expansion, bite correction, Harwell & Cook, Panhandle orthodontist

og_meta.title: Harwell & Cook Orthodontics — Home
og_meta.description: Family‑first orthodontics serving the Texas and Oklahoma Panhandles. Complimentary consultations, 3D scanning, and personalized treatment plans.

image.alt: Harwell & Cook Orthodontics team smiling together in a bright office, community-focused practice image

paragraphs.text: We strive to inspire joy and self-confidence in every patient we treat and to make a positive difference in the relationships we nurture with an authentic treatment experience. We would like to be recognized for creating the best smiles. We encourage everyone to Smile Out Loud!

What makes us different? Our caring and accomplished orthodontists take the time to get to know you and will treat you like family every step of the way. Our highly qualified operatory and administrative care team ensures an outstanding experience for our patients every time. Advanced techniques, technology, and resources ensure that you experience service that exceeds your expectations both in and out of the office.

Dr. Anthony Harwell brings decades of patient-first orthodontic care to Harwell & Cook Orthodontics. Raised in Amarillo, he learned orthodontics working in his father’s practice and later continued the family legacy of compassionate, community-centered care.

image.alt: Dr. Anthony Harwell smiling in clinic

paragraphs.text: Bachelor of Arts in Mathematics, Vanderbilt University. Doctor of Dental Surgery (DDS), Baylor College of Dentistry. Orthodontic residency at the University of Texas Houston Dental Branch, Certificate in Orthodontics and Master of Science.

image.alt: Dr. Harwell at work in the practice

paragraphs.text: Dr. Harwell is deeply connected to the Panhandle community, supporting scholarships and outreach programs. He is proud to continue a family tradition of high-quality orthodontic care and local service.
Full credentials and details for this doctor are available on our Meet the Doctors page. Please visit the doctors page for education, training, and professional highlights.

Dr. Tanner Cook joined Harwell & Cook with a strong focus on patient-centered orthodontic treatment for children and teens. He brings a thoughtful blend of clinical skill and compassion to every case.

Bachelor of Science in Chemistry & Biochemistry, University of Oklahoma. Doctor of Dental Surgery (DDS), University of Oklahoma College of Dentistry. Orthodontic residency, University of Oklahoma, Master of Science and Certificate of Orthodontics (2014).

Dr. Cook grew up in Meers, Oklahoma and returned to the Panhandle region to serve patients locally. He enjoys helping adolescents gain confidence through orthodontic care and is active in community programs.
This doctor's full biography and certification details are available on the Meet the Doctors page. Visit the doctors section for complete education and professional information.

paragraphs.text: Harwell & Cook Orthodontics supports local non-profits, schools, sports teams, and community events. Our Smile For A Lifetime scholarship helps provide braces for patients in need. We also run outreach programs like Smiles for Healthcare Workers and the Braces Bus, and our team volunteers throughout the year.

og_meta.title: About Us | Harwell & Cook Orthodontics
og_meta.description: Learn about Harwell & Cook Orthodontics: our mission, doctors, community programs, and how to schedule a consultation.

image.alt: Smiling family welcomed at Lakeshore Orthodontics front desk

paragraphs.text: Your first visit starts with a new patient exam where you’ll meet our team and get a complete oral evaluation. We’ll take X-rays as needed, discuss your treatment options, and outline a recommended timeline tailored to your smile.

We’ll review your medical history and answer questions about insurance, financing, and payment plans so you can make an informed decision. If it’s more convenient, you can begin with a Virtual Consult by submitting photos online.

image.alt: Father with daughter at reception of dentist's surgery

paragraphs.text: We accept most major insurance plans and will file claims electronically whenever possible to simplify billing for you.
Flexible payment plans are available, and our treatment coordinator will help you find an option that fits your budget and needs.

Before your appointment, please complete our new patient paperwork online to help us provide safe, efficient care. If you prefer to start remotely, submit your photos through our Virtual Consult form and a treatment coordinator will follow up.

image.alt: Patient filling out orthodontic health history forms online

seo.page_description: Request a consultation with Harwell & Cook Orthodontics. Fill out our online form, start a Virtual Consult, or find new patient forms to get started.
seo.page_keywords: orthodontics, new patient, consultation, virtual consult, Harwell & Cook Orthodontics

og_meta.title: Get Started | Harwell & Cook Orthodontics
og_meta.description: Request a consultation with Harwell & Cook Orthodontics. Fill out our online form, start a Virtual Consult, or find new patient forms to get started.

image.alt: Smiling patients of all ages in a bright orthodontic clinic

paragraphs.text: We offer a full range of braces to fit every age and lifestyle. Metal braces remain a durable, cost-effective choice, while ceramic options provide a more discreet look without sacrificing results.
Metal braces use brackets and wires to apply steady pressure that moves teeth into alignment. They are reliable for complex movements and long-term stability.
Ceramic brackets blend with your natural tooth color for a subtler appearance. They offer an effective alternative when patients want less visible treatment.

image.alt: Smiling patient with clear ceramic braces
Two stylish smiling teens taking a selfie

paragraphs.text: We offer self-ligating systems like the Damon brackets that reduce friction and often shorten treatment time, improving comfort throughout your orthodontic journey.
Invisalign<sup>®</sup> uses a series of clear, removable aligners to move teeth precisely. It’s an excellent option for adults and teens who want effective, discreet treatment.
Patients can eat and brush normally during treatment, and advanced 3D imaging helps the team plan predictable movement with ClinCheck® software.

image.alt: Close-up of clear aligner being placed on teeth

paragraphs.text: Spark clear aligners offer a comfortable, precise alternative to traditional braces. Each tray is custom-made and hand-finished for a refined fit.
Overbites, underbites, and crossbites can affect chewing, speech, and long-term dental health. We use targeted appliances and coordinated treatment plans to correct bite issues early and effectively.
Palatal expanders gently widen the upper jaw to improve bite alignment, create room for crowded teeth, and sometimes help breathing-related issues.

When sleep-disordered breathing affects health and quality of life, orthodontic approaches can be part of a multidisciplinary plan. We offer assessment and can coordinate care with sleep specialists and surgeons.
We provide an at-home sleep study kit to help diagnose sleep apnea, and then work with your care team to develop a tailored treatment plan.

image.alt: Patient information graphic for sleep apnea treatment

paragraphs.text: We use digital scanners like iTero and outcome simulators to create precise 3D records. These tools help plan treatment with accuracy and let you preview expected changes to your smile.
Fast, radiation-free scans capture accurate impressions without traditional goopy materials, improving comfort and efficiency.
ClinCheck® and similar software let your doctor simulate each stage of tooth movement so you and your team can make informed choices about your plan.

image.alt: Modern orthodontic treatment room with digital equipment
